origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.fetch_models', 'description': 'This function retrieves financial models based on the model type and scope.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'modelType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial model, e.g., asset_pricing, risk_management.'}, {'name': 'scope', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The scope of models to retrieve, e.g., common, advanced.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'models', 'description': 'A list of financial models matching the specified type and scope.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.fetch_models, 它的参数输入如下: 'modelType'是'asset_pricing', 'scope'是'common'.
